subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 30 points and the Cleveland Cavaliers played their best game in months, beating the visiting Washington Wizards, 116-86, on Monday night to take a 2-0 series lead.
snippet: LeBron James scored 30 points and the Cleveland Cavaliers played their best game in months, beating the visiting Washington Wizards, 116-86, on Monday night to take a 2-0 series lead.
